text: Ate asim musa nala tiha (30) ratam da va'ada kita ate usa nu pura kita. Dasa (10) vadha ratam nala. Tam usa de raba da samam cali (40) ratam vica pura ho'i'a. Ate musa ne apane bha'i haruna nu kiha, mere piche tu merim kauma di meri jag'ha agava'i karani ate sudhara karade rahina. Vigara paida karana vali'am de raha nahim' calana
